channel.title: Sort stack bar chart by value
channel.description: Is there a way to sort stack bar chart by value? I am trying an instance using the AWS AMI, but I do not see an option `Sort Y-values` for stacked bar chart. Is this feature available only in paid version?

item.title: Sort stack bar chart by value
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
There is no paid version of Redash.

You should sort the data using the ORDER BY feature of your database.

Read full topic
item.source: Sort stack bar chart by value
